notes.text:
This update for python-paramiko fixes the following issue:

- CVE-2018-1000805: Fixed an authentication bypass in auth_handler.py (bsc#1111151).

notes.text: Paramiko version 2.4.1, 2.3.2, 2.2.3, 2.1.5, 2.0.8, 1.18.5, 1.17.6 contains a Incorrect Access Control vulnerability in SSH server that can result in RCE. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.
